root: ^You enter the final room, and notice another small glitched sprite, but it looks in a better state than the rest.
^‘You enter the tower where your final enemy awaits you.’
^‘A muscular blue orc in shining black armor stands looking at you.’
^‘A knight ? Has this creature eaten the princess maybe ?’
^‘I think the game got corrupted in the copying process. Your friends always have bad quality disks anyway.’
^‘Disks are always cheap, and easily reproducible, it shouldn’t be the issue.’
^‘The orc raises his arm towards you threateningly.’
^‘You th:nk you can  ╳m🭵🭵🭵. I will CONS╰ME you┐ traitor !’
^‘Does he want to eat me now ?’

boss_talk: ^‘Esteemed opponeπt, we are more alike than you may think.’
^‘Is there a goo🭵 enough reason🭵for me being in such a place ?’
^‘And for us ◤o draw each other’s blood ?’
^‘Beware of judging my stance with▘ut acknowledging my foregoings.’
^‘Kai, my dear, are you getting hooked on the action ?’
^‘I pity the immortals who have to endure your ap▎earance.’
^‘The lord orc stands unimpressed by your threats.’
^‘Is he begging ? Does he want to eat me ?’
^You avoid the orc, and can enter the next room
boss_attack: ^‘You slain the creature in its midst. It ┼oesn’t move and loses 5hp.’
boss_equip: ^‘You only have a potion of healing.’
^‘You give it to your opponent who is restored instantly.’
^‘You see that he let you pass, relieved from its pain’
